title: Spätzle and cheese with speck
description: Spätzle is Germany's answer to pasta. This oven-baked version boasts a creamy smoked cheese and speck sauce.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe, you will need a spätzle board and scraper.
ingredients: 400g/14oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
200g/7oz smoked cheese, preferably Bavarian, grated, plus extra for topping
100g/3½oz speck (or other cured ham), finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
